description: Composio enables AI Agents and LLMs to authenticate and integrate with various tools via function calling.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_COPY_SELECTED_TEXT
capabilities.description: Copy currently selected text on the page to clipboard - ideal for extracting highlighted content, copying form data, or harvesting visible text selections.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_DRAG_AND_DROP
capabilities.description: Execute precise drag and drop operations - essential for file uploads, list reordering, element moving, and complex UI interactions that require drag-based manipulation.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_FETCH_WEBPAGE
capabilities.description: DECISION BRAIN: Essential for analysis, planning, and information gathering. PRIMARY USES: Understand page state, locate elements, verify changes, plan next actions FALLBACK ROLE: When screenshot blocked/fails, use this diligently for information FORMAT: html=element discovery & coordinates | markdown=content analysis HYBRID WORKFLOW: Use for decisions â†’ AI agent for precision clicking

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_GET_CLIPBOARD
capabilities.description: Read current content from the system clipboard - essential for data transfer workflows, extracting copied text, and reading user-copied data for processing.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_KEYBOARD_SHORTCUT
capabilities.description: Execute keyboard shortcuts and key combinations - essential for copy/paste, navigation, and application commands that agents need for efficient browser automation.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_MOUSE_CLICK
capabilities.description: MANUAL PRECISION: Coordinate-based clicking - less efficient than AI agent for complex clicks. WHEN TO USE: Simple single clicks when you have exact coordinates BETTER ALTERNATIVE: Use PerformWebTask AI agent for complex/precise clicking PATTERN: FetchWebpage(html) â†’ estimate coordinates â†’ click â†’ verify HINTS: Center ~(640,350) | Header ~y=150 | Content ~y=300-500 | SUCCESS RATE: 85%

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_MOUSE_DOUBLE_CLICK
capabilities.description: Execute a precise double click at specified screen coordinates - ideal for opening files, selecting text, or activating UI elements that require double click gestures.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_MOUSE_DOWN
capabilities.description: Press and hold mouse button at coordinates - use for starting custom drag operations, text selections, or long-press interactions. Must be followed by MouseUp action to complete.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_MOUSE_MOVE
capabilities.description: Move mouse cursor to precise coordinates without clicking - perfect for triggering hover effects, revealing tooltips, and positioning for subsequent interactions.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_MOUSE_UP
capabilities.description: Release mouse button at coordinates - completes drag operations, text selections, and long-press interactions. Should be used after MouseDown to finish mouse button sequences.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_NAVIGATE
capabilities.description: SESSION FOUNDATION: Always start here - creates browser session and navigates to URL. WORKFLOW: Navigate() â†’ FetchWebpage() â†’ Analysis/Planning â†’ AI Agent or Manual interactions â†’ Verify PROVIDES: Live debugUrl for user, initial page snapshot, persistent session TIP: Always show debugUrl to user before proceeding

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_PASTE_TEXT
capabilities.description: Paste text content at the current cursor position - perfect for filling forms, inserting data into text fields, or quick content insertion at focused elements.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_PERFORM_WEB_TASK
capabilities.description: AI AGENT: BEST for precise clicking and complex interactions. PREFERRED FOR: Button clicks, form interactions, precise targeting (coordinates handled well) HYBRID WORKFLOW: Use after FetchWebpage analysis for informed AI interactions WHEN TO USE: Any clicking task, multi-step workflows, dynamic content STRATEGY: AI handles precision â†’ regular tools for verification

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_SCREENSHOT_WEBPAGE
capabilities.description: Capture high-quality screenshot of any webpage with extensive customization options - perfect for archiving, visual documentation, full-page captures, and cross-device viewport testing.

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_SCROLL

capabilities.name: BROWSER_TOOL_SET_CLIPBOARD
capabilities.description: Store text content in the system clipboard for later paste operations - perfect for preparing data transfers, staging content for forms, or cross-application data sharing.
